name: @onwidget/astrowind
description: AstroWind: A free template using Astro 5.0 and Tailwind CSS. Astro starter theme.

scripts.predev:assessments: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=assessments ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 node scripts/generate-cms-config.js && kill-port 4321 8081
scripts.dev:assessments: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=assessments ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 concurrently -k --success first --handle-input "npx decap-server" "astro dev"
scripts.predev:adhd: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=adhd ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 node scripts/generate-cms-config.js && kill-port 4321 8081
scripts.dev:adhd: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=adhd ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 concurrently -k --success first --handle-input "npx decap-server" "astro dev"
scripts.predev:autism: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=autism ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 node scripts/generate-cms-config.js && kill-port 4321 8081
scripts.dev:autism: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=autism ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 concurrently -k --success first --handle-input "npx decap-server" "astro dev"
scripts.precommit: npm run fix && npm run check:astro
scripts.check: npm run check:astro && npm run check:eslint && npm run check:prettier
scripts.check:astro: cross-env WEBSITE_ID=assessments ASSESSMENTS_URL=http://localhost:4321 ADHD_URL=http://localhost:4321 AUTISM_URL=http://localhost:4321 astro check
scripts.fix: npm run fix:eslint && npm run fix:prettier
